content: camp bottle holder crochet pattern by wery cieplo camp bottle holder is a very simple crochet pattern the pattern contains only basic crochet techniques just one day is enough to create a practical camp bottle holder - the perfect travel companion what do you need techniques 55g macrame cotton from yarnart 1 skein = chain - chain 250g 225m st - stitch 4 5 mm crochet hook single_crochet - single_crochet tapestry needle double_crochet - double_crochet scissor dtr - double treble_crochet marker slip_stitch - slip_stitch 2 carabiners start here here is the whole instruction step by step on the following pages you will find photos for each step that will help you make the camp bottle holder body set up 5ch slip_stitch in first chain st to make a loop 8ch single_crochet in a loop x 5 ch4 dtr in a loop body round 8ch single_crochet in a petal x 5 ch4 dtr in last petal place marker repeat body round 5 times in total finishing 5dc in each space slip_stitch to join in round cut the yarn weave ends string string is simply a crochet chain make it as long as you want mine is about 60 cm long tip when you finish the string pull it to align the stitches thread the string through the holes that were created when finishing the edge strap 122ch double_crochet in the 3rd st from the hook means skip 2 sts double_crochet in each st to the end attach carabiners wherever you want accessories camp bottle holder looks great with little accessories you can make whatever you want those little white flowers are simply set up row from the beginning of the pattern 2 wery cieplo © copyright 2024 this design is for private use only 3 set up row step 1 5ch step 3 & 4 x 5 in total step 2 slip_stitch in first chain st step 5 4ch dtr in a loop to make a loop step 3 8ch end of the set up step 4 single_crochet in a loop step 6 place marker wery cieplo © copyright 2024 this design is for private use only 4 body round step 7 8ch step 10 single_crochet here for dtr step 8 single_crochet in a petal end of the row repeat body round 5 times step 7 & 8 x 5 in total in total step 9 4ch dtr tip dtr means end of the round wery cieplo © copyright 2024 this design is for private use only step 12 slip_stitch to join round 5 finishing string & strap step 11 5dc in each space strap 122ch step 11 x 6 times in total skip 2 sts double_crochet in each st attach carabiners string crochet a chain 60 cm thread the string through the holes wery cieplo © copyright 2024 this design is for private use only enjoy #campbottleholder wery cieplo © copyright 2024 this design is for private use only
